# The `MemOpLink` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Holds a pointer to an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lsbasesdnode">LSBaseSDNode</a> as well as information on where it is located in a sequence of memory operations connected by a chain. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Holds a pointer to an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lsbasesdnode">LSBaseSDNode</a> as well as information on where it is located in a sequence of memory operations connected by a chain.
